function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Use of suitable materials, green walls, and roofs along with urban microclimatic control to reduce the need for ontologies based on existing criteria","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementation of contact tracing and testing","category":"Infection tracking /
